comment._content: Clare Cassell and Mrs. Marshall McLean were both tennis champions in the New York area.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks penny.  We can also add that the photo was taken at the Montclair Athletic Club women's singles tournament in Montclair, N.J.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4370904554] I started a biography of each in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mrs._Marshall_McLean en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clare_Cassell

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: The image was taken on September 19, 1913 at the Montclair Athletic Club. Miss Clare Cassell Plays Plucky Game in Montclair Tourney. select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F60A15F6395B1373...
